meanings.definition: To make a theme or topic the subject of something.
meanings.sent1: The teacher thematizes the importance of teamwork in her class.
meanings.sent2: She always thematizes different historical events in her lectures.
meanings.sent3: The way he thematizes the idea of friendship in his stories is quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork thematizes the beauty of nature in a unique way.
meanings.sent5: The documentary thematizes the struggles of endangered species, leaving a lasting impact on viewers.

meanings.definition: To give a particular theme or topic to something.
meanings.sent1: The party planner thematizes the event with a tropical theme.
meanings.sent2: She always thematizes her presentations with colorful visuals.
meanings.sent3: His decision to thematize the office party as a beach day was a hit with the staff.
meanings.sent4: The designer thematizes her clothing line around sustainability and eco-friendly materials.
meanings.sent5: The author thematizes her novels with elements of mystery and suspense, captivating readers.
